title: J.D., is a retired attorney, currently teaching history and political science at Pima Community College, Tucson, Arizona. He has authored a number of papers and articles dealing with aspects of medieval law, including “Lawyers on the Margins: Gendered Images of the Legal Vocation in Medieval France
– 16, 2000, and “Reason, Rhetoric and Redemption: The teaching of law and the Planctus Mariae in the Late Middle Ages
